title: Telling someone to KYS should be ban on action.
body: Telling someone to kill themselves and constantly flaming should be a ban on sight. Happened to me last game where the silver 3 constantly pinged me when I last hit his minions when he was dead and told me to be map aware (?) and learn lane control. It's simply not an acceptable behaviour to tell someone to jump off a cliff.
